All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BbrecommenderbeApplication
Main class of the application when running the application, you can http://localhost:8080/swagger-ui/index.html for the swagger documentation
DetailController
REST controller for handling requests related to detailed recommendations.
DetailedRecommendationDTO
The DetailedRecommendationDTO class represents a detailed recommendation.
Faq
The Faq class represents a Faq object. it has and ID and a question.
FaqController
REST controller for handling requests related to FAQs.
FaqRepositroy
Repository for the FAQ enity class
FeatureValuesTools
Class that contains all the values for the features of the tools.
FileController
The FileController class handles requests related to file operations.
FileService
Service for the file conversion from html to pdf
FilterOptions
enity class for to store the filter options (user input) in the data base
filterOptionsRepository
Repository for the filterOptions enity class
MarketingTool
this is the entity class for the marketing tools that are stored in the database
MarketingToolDTO
The MarketingToolDTO class represents a MarketingTool object.
MarketingToolRepository
Repository for the MarketingTool enity class
OverviewController
The OverviewController class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to Recommendations.
RatingCalculatorService
Service that calculates the score for a feature based on the thresholds and the weight of the feature
Recommendation
enity class for to store the recommendation in the data base It has a one to one relation with the filter options and a many to one relation with the toolinfo
RecommendationController
REST controller for handling requests related to recommendations.
RecommendationDTO
The RecommendationDTO class represents a recommendation object.
RecommendationMapper
Mapper for that maps recommendation class to recommendationDTO class and vice versa
RecommendationRepository
Repository for the Recommendation enity class
RecommendationService
Service that return all the calculations and uses the RatingCalculatorService to calculate the rating for a tool
RecommendedToolNameResponse
payload that is send back after every calculation
ResponseMessage
payload that is send back after every request to show what the response is.
StringValues
Class that has all the string values of all the feature names there are
ThresholdValues
Class that contains all the values for the thresholds of the features of the tools.
ToolDataDTO
This class is used to store the data of the tool that is being updated this is used as userinput data, to calcultate the score of the input
ToolDataMapper
Mapper for that maps marketingTool class to toolDataDTO class and vice versa
ToolDetailedInfo
this is the entity class that stores the detailed info of the marketing tools in the database
ToolDetailedInfoDTO
The ToolDetailedInfoDTO class represents ToolDetailedInfo object with information about a tool.
ToolInfoRepository
Repository for the ToolDetailedInfo entity class
UpdateScore
Class that contains the scheduled tasks for the application to update the score after 8am or initialize the score after startup
WebCorsConfig
Configuration class for enabling cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) for a Spring Web MVC application.
WeightValues
Class that contains all the values for the weights of the features of the tools.
